items.sentence: Tom was a lot taller than me when we were kids.
Tom was able to recite the whole poem by heart.
Tom was absent from school because he was sick.
Tom is still very traumatized by what happened.
I can\'t believe that I\'m working on a Sunday.
I\'m really not that worried about the weather.
The last bus will be leaving in thirty minutes.
Tom speaks French much better than anyone else.
Tom spoke to Mary for the first time yesterday.
I know a lot of people who can\'t speak French.
I have something important to discuss with Tom.
Tom is willing to do almost anything for money.
Tom is willing to sacrifice everything for you.
Tom is worried about what Mary is going to say.
Tom can speak French almost as well as you can.
Tom put some presents under the Christmas tree.
Tom put three candles on the dining room table.
Tom knows why Mary is planning to go to Boston.
Have you ever bought cookies from a Girl Scout?
I still need to fill out this application form.
